file.name: sophos_central.yaml
file.content:
components:
  schemas:
    tmp0:
      properties:
        correlationId: {type: string}
        error: {type: string}
        requestId: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp1:
      properties:
        allowedActions: {type: string}
        category: {type: string}
        description: {type: string}
        groupKey: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        managedAgent_id: {type: string}
        managedAgent_type: {type: string}
        person_id: {type: string}
        product: {type: string}
        raisedAt: {type: string}
        severity: {type: string}
        tenant_id: {type: string}
        tenant_name: {type: string}
        type: {type: string}
      type: object
    tmp2:
      properties:
        apiHost: {type: string}
        billingType: {type: string}
        dataGeography: {type: string}
        dataRegion: {type: string}
        id: {type: string}
        name: {type: string}
        organization: {type: string}
        partner_id: {type: string}
      type: object
  securitySchemes: {}
info:
  contact: {email: frikky@shuffler.io, name: '@frikkylikeme', url: 'https://twitter.com/frikkylikeme'}
  description: Automated generation of Sophos Sophos Central
  title: Sophos Sophos Central
  version: 1.0.0
  x-logo: data:image/png;base64,
openapi: 3.0.2
paths:
  tmp0:
    post:
      description: Apply an action to an alert in Sophos Central
      parameters:
      - description: ID of the tenant where the alert is
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Tenant ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Alert ID on the tenant to send an action to
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Alert ID
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Action to apply to the alert, see README for options
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Action
        required: true
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Optional message to attach when applying the action
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Optional Message
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp0'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Sophos Central Alert Action
  tmp1:
    post:
      description: Get Alerts from Sophos Central
      parameters:
      - description: Filter by product type, see README for allowed values
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Product Filter
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Filter by category type, see README for allowed values
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Category Filter
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Filter by severity level, see README for allowed values
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Severity Filter
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Filter by alert ID
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: IDs Filter
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      - description: Filter alerts by tenant ID
        example: ''
        in: query
        name: Tenant IDs Filter
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp1'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Sophos Get Alerts
  tmp2:
    post:
      description: Get a list of Tenants in Sophos Central
      parameters:
      - description: Limit the results returned
        example: ''
        in: body
        name: Limit
        required: false
        schema: {type: string}
      responses:
        '200':
          content:
            application/json:
              schema: {$ref: '#/components/schemas/tmp2'}
          description: Successful request
      summary: Sophos Central Get Tenants
tags:
- {name: Endpoint Security & Management}

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "tmp0": path MUST begin with a forward slash
